Title: Relates to paid family leave and bereavement for fetal death, still birth, and an infant being medically not viable to survive
Summary: Relates to paid family leave and bereavement for fetal death, still birth, and an infant being medically not viable to survive.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to paid family leave and bereavement for fetal death, still birth, and an infant being medically not viable to survive
